Accountant Job at Creditcrest Capital and Investment




        
    

        
        Creditcrest Capital and Investment is a financial company that offers loans ranging from micro loan (retail), macro loan, SME loan, salary advance loan, asset financing, school support loan, and solar energy products (Sunking partnership). At Creditcrest Capital, we believe in smart financial solutions to help businesses manage cash flow, access funding, and grow sustainably.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Abeokuta, Ogun

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare and process financial documentations such as invoice,payment records, and expenses tracking for the branch.
	Manage the financial bookkeeping of the branch.
	Ensure daily and monthly reconciliation of branch account.
	Monitor and analyze petty cash expenses,posting them into the organizations software.
	Maintain accurate records of branch costs and expenses.
	Reconcile branch account with the general ledger.
	Sort and post financial documents into proper accounts.
	Assist the head of accounts in preparing the branch budget.
	Ensure the branch complies with company policies and regulatory requirements.
	Perform any other duties assigned by management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND, Bachelor's or Master's Degree with 2-5 years of experience.
	Proven experience as an accountant, preferably in the financial service or microfinance sector.
	Strong understanding of bookkeeping,financial reporting,and reconciliation processing.
	Proficiency in accounting software and Ms office applications.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Attention to details and ability to meet deadlines.
	Knowledge of financial regulations and compliance requirements.
	Strong communication and organizational skills.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits
	Dynamic and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development.
	A chance to make a meaningful impact on our operations and communities.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV or Resume to: info@creditcrestcapital.com using the Job Posiiton as the subject of the email.

We are professionals in Civil Engineering, Steel Structure, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering and we are a KIRBY authorized builder in Nigeria. We specialize in delivering to our clients Turn key Projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Junior Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Purpose (Summary)


	To support the Finance &amp; Accounts Department in maintaining accurate financial records, processing transactions, reconciling accounts, and preparing financial reports.
	The role ensures adherence to company accounting policies, supports audit activities, and contributes to the accuracy and integrity of financial information for effective management decisions.


Key Responsibilities


	Record and update daily financial transactions including cash, bank, and site payments.
	Verify and file supporting documents such as receipts, invoices, and waybills.
	Prepare weekly cash expense reports and reconcile balances with the accountant.
	Monitor site cash usage and ensure reports align with actual disbursements.
	Post approved payment vouchers and journal entries accurately.
	Track staff and site cash advances, ensuring prompt retirements.
	Assist in updating asset records and generating accurate reports.
	Produce weekly and monthly financial reports for management review.
	Maintain bank and petty cash reconciliations.
	Support month-end closing activities and report generation.
	Follow up on financial discrepancies and incomplete documentation.
	Ensure compliance with company accounting policies and internal controls.
	Assist in internal and external audit preparations.


Method of Application

        Rosettee Construction is a construction company that has been incorporated for over three (3) Decades, offering productive and seamless services. We are professionals in Civil Engineering, Steel Structure, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering and we are a KIRBY authorized builder in Nigeria. We specialize in delivering to our clients Turn key Projects.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Accountant

Job Location: Lagos

Job Purpose (Summary)
     

            
    




	To support the Finance & Accounts Department in maintaining accurate financial records, processing transactions, reconciling accounts, and preparing financial reports.
	The role ensures adherence to company accounting policies, supports audit activities, and contributes to the accuracy and integrity of financial information for effective management decisions.


Key Responsibilities


	Record and update daily financial transactions including cash, bank, and site payments.
	Verify and file supporting documents such as receipts, invoices, and waybills.
	Prepare weekly cash expense reports and reconcile balances with the accountant.
	Monitor site cash usage and ensure reports align with actual disbursements.
	Post approved payment vouchers and journal entries accurately.
	Track staff and site cash advances, ensuring prompt retirements.
	Assist in updating asset records and generating accurate reports.
	Produce weekly and monthly financial reports for management review.
	Maintain bank and petty cash reconciliations.
	Support month-end closing activities and report generation.
	Follow up on financial discrepancies and incomplete documentation.
	Ensure compliance with company accounting policies and internal controls.
	Assist in internal and external audit preparations.


Method of Application
